website_summaries.verdict: You can attach this bag to your keys, and it seals with both a zipper and hook-and-loop closure.
pros: Carbon lining traps and eliminates odors
Soft and flexible once you break it in
cons: Fully zipping the zipper can be challenging, and without being fully zipped, faint smells may escape

customer_reviews.title: Got pulled over by a cop with a drug dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Got pulled over by a cop with a drug dog and didnt get arrested with a quarter of potpurri...just sayin
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding nasty cigarette butts while hiking.
customer_reviews.text: My intended use for this probably wasn't the same as most folks, but it worked really well. I needed a sort of 'butt bag' for a hiking/camping weekend out in the wilderness. Didn't want to be the guy who leaves cigarette butts out in a pristine forest, but also HATE the smell of stale cigarette butts and didn't want it wafting around my pack all weekend. This bag completely eliminates the smell of them, and holds a few packs worth of butts. My friends and I were able to enjoy ourselves, guilt-free, thanks to this little bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rogers

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars even with zipper "flaw"
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do....many of the low star ratings has to do with a tiny flaw with the zipper that doesn't close completely...the "humongous" gap they are referring to is approximately 1/2 a centimeter....and even if it were more than that, it hardly matters...I have, on occasion, closed the velcro flap without closing the zipper and still no smell was detected. I waited a while to write this review (I purchased this Nov 2017) so I have been using it almost daily for 3 months. Still does exactly what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Adilia13

customer_reviews.title: One one my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.text: Can't smell a thing, no matter what you put in there. Once you break it in, it is very soft and flexible. I use it to store my PAX and various other things. But with the Velcro piece that folds over, unless you put your nose right to the zipper joint, you're not going to smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: This came in useful on a family vacation trip
customer_reviews.text: This came in useful on a family vacation trip. I used it to store and carry my Pax Era / concentrate vaporizor pen in my backpack. Long hot car rides in MO, airplanes, airports, tram, etc. My mom has hearing aids so her sense of smell is top notch, and she never mentioned it once. It's not a flaw proof design but for the price and size, it's functionality is more than enough for what this is for. Would recommend this over anything fancier for an application like this, to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Note the many reviews that complain of same problem.
customer_reviews.text: The numerous 1 star reviews that complain about the zipper not being able to fully close are apparently all true; certainly applies to the one I received. The way the bag is sewn and constructed prevents the zipper from being closed all the way; it will remain about 1/2 inch open. Hold it to your nose and you'll easily see that this renders the supposed odor proof bag useless for odor blocking. This is a basic design flaw. Do yourself a favor and choose a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Harpman

customer_reviews.title: great bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 odorless bags so far, this is the one that has stood the test of time. I've ordered 3 now, all last a long time, durable and smell proof to humans. I don't believe this will fool a dog, mainly because where the zipper meets the end there is a tiny opening. leave it sitting out on a room with your strongest smelling....herbs and you will not smell a thing, pick it up, you still won't, but get your nose to where the zipper flaw is, you can smell it. Still, this is the best scent proof bag out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. The zipper doesn't shut all the way which is a little disappointing. You can smell whatever you put inside near that corner but you have to really put your nose up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Small but reliable as far as scent masking
customer_reviews.text: Update on 3 March 3rd, 2020: No longer contains any scent. Highly disappointed. Note: I love the bags travel size, I re-ordered it because It’s great but only as long as the carbon is containing the smell which isn’t very long but the price reflects such I guess. Purchased on January 6th, 2020: I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eastonocean

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Before this I would always have a lingering "scent" around my apartment, but with this the smell is gone! There's no smell even when I smell it right against my nose. It fits approximately 2 items in it and is palm sized. Its also great to travel with. A few reviews mentioned how the zipper doesn't close all the way, which occurred with mine as well, however that doesn't effect its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Niharika Dahata

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little bags everyone should own one who smokes
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bags. For those of you out there that are complaining that the zipper does not close, it actually does close you just can't overstuff it with huge bowls and pipes guys. put a one in there a decent size onie a Chillum or something like that. If you're looking to tote around a bong or a small bong or anything like that these little bags will not work for you. They are perfect however for a small bag of very small pipe Chillum or onie.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Whiteaker

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exchanged the first bag for another because the the zipper was sewn on all messed up and doesn’t completely close. They sent me another one with the SAME damn problem. The zipper won’t close all the way. HOW IS IT SUPPOSED TO WORK IF IT DOESNT CLOSE ALL THE WAY! WTH! What a waste of time looking for and then waiting for this product. Had high hopes, but they was like “Naw dawg.” Just spend the extra on a Ryot Case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Perfect size for my four-inch pipe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Perfect size for my four-inch pipe, a small container of herb, and a lighter. I was even able to shove my pipe and a half ounce of herb in it once. And no smell!! It's amazing. I used to use this little Vera Bradley tech case, which fit all my necessities and looked super cute, but it did not cover the smell! I put a half-smoked bowl in this pouch and still no smell, and we all know how bad a half-smoked bowl smells.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Not completely smell proof but very spacous
customer_reviews.text: Not completely smell proof at all. I love that it is big enough to hold a Quarter, a small grinder, some papers, and a few lighters however when I hold it up to my nose, the smell leaks right through. If this were in a drawer somewhere, I doubt it would be very noticeable but I still keep it in a ziploc for extra measure as we are trying to sell the house and there is a lot of foot traffic in and out. If it zipped up all the way and were more completely smell proof, I would give it a full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christina_Tea

customer_reviews.title: Epically small
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously small, serves no purpose because you can fit nothing in it. Picture is misleading, look at the measurements. 100% regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: It will not close
customer_reviews.text: WOW, what a terribly crafted pouch. It’s poorly sewn. The zipper stays open so how can this be a “Smell Proof Bag”. Even the design was sewn crooked. Amazing china crap, again. Wow, no pride in their work, one inch
customer_reviews.author: nica

customer_reviews.title: Smellproof to the Max!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, if I had one complaint the length would be a little longer, but does the job well...definitely the best product like this I've found yet. You will not be disappointed. I have 2 of these and have purchased the larger size ones for 3 friends. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: mwr510

customer_reviews.title: This is super great!
customer_reviews.text: Very much incredibly surprised over this little pouch!! It is small but I don’t need it to hold a whole lot. No detectable order, not even from the edges where the zipper ends/begins. If I could give it 10 stars I would. Buy one and rest easy.
customer_reviews.author: RobNCatK

customer_reviews.title: Works great minus slight zipper issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, small, zipper-closure "odor free" bag that is perfect for carrying around any smoking tools and accessories you may have. There's a charcoal lining inside, that's how it fights against unpleasant odors. As long as it's fully zipped and the top panel is folded over, I can't detect any unwanted smells. The only issue is that it can be a little difficult to fully close the zipper, but even if it hangs slightly open, I would say 90% of the odor is still gone so it is still highly effective. I plan on repurchasing once my current bag can no longer fight odors (I've been using it for about 3-4 months and still going strong).
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie N

customer_reviews.title: Keeps scents INSIDE
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all the 420 goodness inside. I usually keep the pouch stored in a lingerie draw & NOTHING in there smells like 🍃 Great buy
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not really “smell proof”
customer_reviews.text: It’s lined, so it will protect from falls/drops, and that is the only reason it got 3 stars. It doesn’t zip all the way. The zipper doesn’t close all the way so there’s no way it’s smell proof.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We all know what these are most useful for. Really keeps the funk contained. I just bought a second one because the first one stopped blocking the smell after over a year. I carry my stuff with me everywhere and so long as it's in this pouch, nobody suspects a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Eden O.

customer_reviews.title: PROMISE>THIS THING WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: LEO blind tested. I was recently involved in an accident. My pouch was crammed FULL of Lemon Drops at the time, which as we all know smells VERY Loud. LEO had her head OVER the seat twice and nothing. Nothing! This thing is now worth around 15000K to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry items with strong odors. IT works, enough said.
customer_reviews.author: rawbert

customer_reviews.title: It truly does the job!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect, the material is great and it keeps ALL odors inside!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA CAMPO

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: So it's not closing all the way but does help with smells
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Smell????? NO SMEL!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Keeps all the herbs from reeking. 5/5 Would recommend to smokers of all verity. Please if you travel with smelly things often, invest in one of these and travel SAFE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I surprised to see a nice piece of material on that edge so it doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about how the zipper didn’t go all the way to the edge, I surprised to see a nice piece of material on that edge so it doesn’t allow anything in or out. Works better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scent Free Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size and is so good at hiding odors, it almost seems like magic!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Small and highly effective at eliminating odors.
customer_reviews.text: Great at eliminating odors. I often use airtight containers but I wanted a small and inexpensive odorless bag. This bag is incredibly good at eliminating odors but as other users have said if you get very close to the bank you can still you can still make out a faint smell period but for the price it does a merry good job and it's very small good if you want it keep it discreet. So I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: elmer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Item is too small for my use and can not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sezniko

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof for up to 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago and wanted to write my review. The zipper only lasted about 8 months in after that it wouldn’t close all the way and the smell was noticeable. Before then it was smell proof and was very discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bag
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn’t close all the way but I saw that beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - Falls Apart Quickly - Junk
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after about 30 days. Seller would not stand by the product. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is compact and completely fights any unwanted orders. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is compact and completely fights any unwanted orders. Has plenty of room for a small bowl and other product.
customer_reviews.author: thatonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, durability is strong
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you're trying to occult any pungent smell. Only issue I have is the durability of the charcoal lining in the product (which is what cancels out the smell), but even then it still lasts for a long time. I've owned this product for about 7 months and whatever is inside can barely be smelt.
customer_reviews.author: Muse

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag, Works great. There is a small gap at the end when you zip it closed but it is easy to fix. I will order again. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for hiding scent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little carry case. Used it to travel and it worked well as far as hiding scent.
customer_reviews.author: nik123

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Product that Zips Completely Shut Instead
customer_reviews.text: I definitely should have read the critical reviews more closely. The zipper does not even zip all the way shut, making it effectively useless. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Hosta Seizure

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect hippie
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, and this keeps stinky herbals on the down low. This is the perfect hippie accessory
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job even though the zipper really sucks and won't close completely.
customer_reviews.author: James Gummer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for heading out for the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on it
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel comfortable using this pouch for its intended use. I don't believe it will keep odor from seeping out. The zipper doesnt close all of the way and there's a Velcro latch that hinges over the top but does not succeed in any way at sealing the pouch. Of you're looking for something that will keep you safe from prying noses, I don't recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice LITTLE pouch
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I had hoped, but I can fit rolling papers, glass filter, pipe, ashtray, and lighter. Need to keep my herbs in a separate jar tho, which is annoying since I'd like to keep it all together. But the pouch does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely works a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product there is absolutely no Oder coming from the pouch love it !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work ok. How to keep it clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. How to keep it clean and rejuvenate it would be worth knowing.
customer_reviews.author: Minotaur

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% smell proof, but great product!! Fits in my pocket!! A great tip: put a dryer sheet inside to completely seal your property's odor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully zip closed
customer_reviews.text: It's okay.. It won't fully zip closed so there's always some smell escaping. Not sure if it's a defect Or just my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pondplayer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not bad, just a lot smaller than i though it would be.
customer_reviews.author: CJZ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and received a beat by Dre headphone bag
customer_reviews.author: Pf CiNCO

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: It is s little smaller than I expected. It looks like a wallet...perfect for transporting my stinkables.
customer_reviews.author: RoyS

customer_reviews.title: My bag was fine. Zipper
customer_reviews.text: My bag was fine. Zipper, velcro, stitching.. use it everyday. No one complains of the pipe smell anymore. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jost

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but not bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but can't handle skunk. A bit smaller than I expected but overall - a good product
customer_reviews.author: sb885

customer_reviews.title: Great smellproof pouch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, had it over a year and it still works. No smell leaks ever and really compact enought to carry in your jacket pocket or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well. Though is a bit smaller than I thought, but good for your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Yrose

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what one would hope and expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Olson

customer_reviews.title: Can't fit much other than your bud a lighter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't fit much other than your bud a lighter and a small bowl but it really does hide any smell.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof approved!
customer_reviews.text: Its proving to me that it works still no smell inside of bad after taking out the smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... this three stars because the bag was absolutely nothing like the picture at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars because the bag was absolutely nothing like the picture at all. I bought this purposely to fit in my purse, all the reviews said the dimensions were the perfect size I was looking for. It ended up being a huge bag, almost like the makeup/toiletry bags that come with luggage sets. Huge! It certainly does a good job eliminating odors and fulfills its intended purpose but I definitely would have spent my money on a different product had the photos and descriptions been more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bag does a pretty good job. Not fooling a dog that's for sure
customer_reviews.author: G-MASS

customer_reviews.title: it truly fights the funk
customer_reviews.text: it does its job well, and its the perfect size for a small pipe, lighter, and bud. I use it like a carrying-case bc of the handheld size and effective odor trapping it has. I might even buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Kinda takes away from it being a "funk fighter" but a good size and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn't zip all the way. Kinda takes away from it being a "funk fighter" but a good size and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected even with the zipper not closing all the way.👌🏾👌🏾👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: matthewfletcher

customer_reviews.title: butttttttt it’s a safe bet ur good if a k9 is in your car
customer_reviews.text: Dog tested. I won’t give specifics, butttttttt it’s a safe bet ur good if a k9 is in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Dose

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I can carry it in my pocket and as soon as I put anything in it and zip it up, the smell disappears. Whether it's roses, onions, herbs of ALL sorts, it does the job. Get this if you have something stinky that you don't want to be stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper doesn't close all the way - sort of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dougg99

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I put some pungent herb in the pouch and the scent immediately went away. Even after several hours no smell is detectable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great size for me and hides the smell so well, best one ive had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Klopf

customer_reviews.title: No smells!
customer_reviews.text: I have never heard of a product like this until I saw recommendations. I used this to transport some smelly medicine and it worked great for me as I was very worried about a strong aroma following me around. I put this in my purse and no smell!! In fact, as soon as I got home and unzipped it my Fiancé immediately smelled my meds and said how great it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Miller

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. The zipper doesn't even close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ohren

customer_reviews.title: Fights the Funk
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Small but holds enough for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: JoePasco

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and more definitely keeps all smells out plenty of space .. 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Mytzie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the smell contained!
customer_reviews.text: Held smell in much more efficiently than I expected, and for longer. Though after a couple weeks of keeping a pipe in there it definitely started to give off a bit of a smell, but as long as I kept it in my purse and didn't open it a lot you couldn't smell a thing! Took it to work no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Caysa Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Below average product
customer_reviews.text: Sipper is not secured. Not smell proof, but is a Hady bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Invisibility Cloak but for Smell!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! Been using the same one for around a year and it cloaks a lot of smell!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: exceedin expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing and delivery was fast. I'm going to buy another one because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: rainman

customer_reviews.title: And to those smokers out there you know how bad a just used pipe smells
customer_reviews.text: I keep my smelly pipe and herb in here and no smell! And to those smokers out there you know how bad a just used pipe smells!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine...you sent a much bigger bag than I ordered
customer_reviews.author: damon davie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Craftsmanship could be better but holds all I need and keeps in the strongest of smells.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Sizlac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I could have ever imagined! Love it... Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and perfect size for a bag, piece and lighter. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: It'll only fit essentials like a lighter a tiny pipe and a small stash container. It also doesn't close all the way with the zipper. So unless you're only looking for something that'll hold very small items, don't get this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Both items are a waste. Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Zippers don't close. Both items are a waste. Ordered two
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this item. You can smell NOTHING through this awesome little pouch (and I do mean nothing). These are so handy when you have something with a distinct odor that spreads to other items in your bags. Pop it in one of these little bad boys and worry no more. Time to order another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I have ordered three
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have ordered three, one was black, two were grey. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. There were no measurements on the listing. I'm not sure this'll work for what I need it for. I want to use it for carrying dog poop bags (with poop) off the trail while hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Epp-Carter

customer_reviews.title: Tad small but still good
customer_reviews.text: It is alot smaller then what the pictures show but i should be able to make it work for what i need.
customer_reviews.author: james fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little product. Keeps the smell out completely. Wish I would have bought a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Carter

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: The bag would get a 5/5, but the zipper defeats the purpose. It does not close completely so a little smell will always be leaked out. If you put your herb in a smell proof bag and then into this bag like i do, it works very well. Please be aware that the zipper is messed up on all the bags, not just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please read before you buy
customer_reviews.text: This product seems very cheaply made the zipper is off big time and mine came with a Velcro flap that covers the zipper Inside it is nothing more then a air purifier Filter sewn into the sides, but I'm almost certain it would cut down the stench of something pungent
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

product_meta.title: Funk Fighter Odorless Pocket Bag
product_meta.description: The Funk Fighter Pocket Bag has high-quality carbon lining to trap and eliminate odors. The Pocket Bag measures 5", x 4", and features the main zippered compartment and a convenient attached key ring.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
